mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.business_type AS "businessType", a.method AS "method", a.request_method AS "requestMethod", a.operator_type AS "operatorType", a.oper_name AS "operName", a.oper_url AS "operUrl", a.oper_ip AS "operIp", a.oper_location AS "operLocation", a.oper_param AS "operParam", a.json_result AS "jsonResult", a.status AS "status", a.oper_time AS "operTime"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_log a
AND a.status = #{status}
AND a.title LIKE concat('%', #{title}, '%')
AND a.oper_name LIKE concat('%', #{operName}, '%')
ORDER BY a.oper_time DESC
mapper.insert: insert into sys_log(title, business_type, method, request_method, operator_type, oper_name, dept_name, oper_url, oper_ip, oper_location, oper_param, json_result, status, error_msg, oper_time) values (#{title}, #{businessType}, #{method}, #{requestMethod}, #{operatorType}, #{operName}, #{deptName}, #{operUrl}, #{operIp}, #{operLocation}, #{operParam}, #{jsonResult}, #{status}, #{errorMsg}, sysdate())
